  • Constructor Details

    • GreenSQA

      public GreenSQA()
      Constructor for GreenSQA class. Initializes the projects array to a new Project array of size SIZE and initializes the managers array to an array of three Employee objects with hardcoded values.

  • Method Details

    • addProject

      public String addProject(String name, double budget, int[] monthsPerStage, int[] managersPosition, String[] clientData)
      addProject: This method adds the project with the parameters entered to the project array. It assigns the dates corresponding to each stage and assigns the project in the first valid position, if there are no valid positions, it returns an error message.
      Parameters:
      name - The project's name
      budget - The budget's project
      monthsPerStage - Duration in months of each stage
      managersPosition - Positions of the project managers
      clientData - Name and phone number of the client
      Returns:
      Validation message

    • closeStageProject

      public String closeStageProject(int projectPosition)
      This method close de active stage of a project, and active the next stage, if there are not more stages, it inactive the project
      Parameters:
      projectPosition - porject position to close the active stage
      Returns:
      Validation message

    • registerCapsule

      public String registerCapsule(int collaboratorPos, int projectPosition, String description, int type, String lesson)
      This method receives the parameters to register a capsule and sends it to the Project class via dependency injection
      Parameters:
      collaboratorPos - Position of the creator / collaborator of the capsule
      projectPosition - Position of the project where to register the capsule
      description - Description of the capsule with a minimum keyword
      type - Type of the capsule
      lesson - Lesson of the capsule with a minimum keyword
      Returns:
      Validation message

    • approveCapsule

      public String approveCapsule(int projectPos, int capsulePos)
      Approves a capsule for a project at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      projectPos - the position of the project in the projects array
      capsulePos - the position of the capsule in the stage active's capsule array
      Returns:
      Validation message

    • publicCapsule

      public String publicCapsule(int projectPos, int capsulePos)
      Publishes a capsule for a project at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      projectPos - the position of the project in the projects array
      capsulePos - the position of the capsule in the project's capsule array
      Returns:
      Validation message

    • projectsIsEmpty

      public int projectsIsEmpty()
      This method return the last full position in projects array
      Returns:

    • registerCapsuleModel

      public void registerCapsuleModel()

    • getProjectNames

      public String[] getProjectNames()
      Returns an array of project names.
      Returns:
      An array of strings with the names of all registered projects.

    • getProjectStatus

      public boolean getProjectStatus(int projectPosition)
      Returns the status of a given project.
      Parameters:
      projectPosition - The position of the project in the projects array.
      Returns:
      True if the project is active, false if it is not.

    • getProjectEndDate

      public String getProjectEndDate(int projectPosition)
      Returns the end date of a given project formatted as a string.
      Parameters:
      projectPosition - The position of the project in the projects array.
      Returns:
      A string with the end date of the project formatted as "dd/MM/yyyy".

    • getStageNames

      public String[] getStageNames()
      Returns an array of stage names for the default project.
      Returns:
      An array of strings with the names of all stages in the default project.

    • getStageActiveName

      public String getStageActiveName(int projectPosition)
      Returns the name of the active stage for a given project.
      Parameters:
      projectPosition - The position of the project in the projects array.
      Returns:
      A string with the name of the active stage for the project.

    • getManagerNames

      public String[] getManagerNames()
      Returns an array of manager names.
      Returns:
      An array of strings with the names of all registered managers.

    • getCollaboratorNames

      public String[] getCollaboratorNames()
      Returns an array of collaborator names for the default project.
      Returns:
      An array of strings with the names of all collaborators in the default project.

    • getCapsuleTypes

      public String[] getCapsuleTypes()
      Returns an array of capsule types for the default project.
      Returns:
      An array of strings with the types of all capsules in the default project.

    • getCapsulesInfo

      public String[][] getCapsulesInfo(int projectPosition, int capsulesStatus)
      Returns a two-dimensional array with the information of all capsules in a given project and status.
      Parameters:
      projectPosition - The position of the project in the projects array.
      capsulesStatus - The status of the capsules to retrieve (1 for pending, 2 for approved, 3 for published).
      Returns:
      A two-dimensional array with the information of all capsules in the specified project and status.

    • getAmountCapsules

      public int getAmountCapsules(int projectPosition, int capsulesStatus)
      Returns the amount of capsules with a given status for a given project.
      Parameters:
      projectPosition - The position of the project in the projects array.
      capsulesStatus - The status of the capsules to count (1 for pending, 2 for approved, 3 for published).
      Returns:
      The amount of capsules with the specified status in the specified project.
